hero.subtext: From physical products and modular kits to experimental robotics, interactive games, and applied AI, Orpus Labs explores where design, engineering, and intelligence converge.

overview.title: Building things that work.
overview.subtitle: One prototype at a time.
overview.paragraph1: Orpus Labs is a homegrown research and engineering studio focused on building intelligent robotics, modular systems, and creative products.
overview.paragraph2: We blend mechanical design with AI-driven cognition to explore how machines can move, perceive, and respond.

sectors.title: Our
sectors.subtitle: From physical products to advanced robotics, interactive games, and AI-driven systems, we build across the spectrum.

items.name: 3D Printed Products
items.description: Thoughtfully designed functional and decorative products, created through accessible 3D printing.

items.name: Games
items.description: Game development using Unreal Engine, exploring interaction, systems design, and player experience.

items.name: Robot Kits
items.description: Experimental learning kits designed to explore intelligent robotics through hands-on interaction.

items.name: Robotic Systems
items.description: Full robotic systems integrating perception, decision-making, and action.

products.title: Our
products.subtitle: Objects of intent. A rigorous balance of form and function, curated for those who value the thought behind the make.

lab.title: The
lab.subtitle: Research and experimentation in robotics, product design, and game development. Here's what we're working on.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.paragraph1: We believe meaningful progress in robotics comes from iterative experimentation. Each prototype teaches us something, and each failure points to a better direction.
approach.paragraph2: Our lab operates with a focus on accessible technologies — using 3D printing for rapid mechanical iteration, open-source software for transparency, and modular designs for easier understanding and modification.
approach.highlight: We share our process, not just our results. Follow along as we build, break, and rebuild.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: A homegrown research and engineering studio exploring intelligent robotics, 3D-printed products, and game development.
about.intro: is a design studio that builds premium products with clarity and purpose.

values.title: Curiosity
values.desc: Everything begins with curiosity. We explore ideas by questioning, testing, and learning through making.

values.title: Making
values.desc: We believe understanding comes from building. Hands-on creation is at the core of how we think, learn, and refine.

values.title: Intent
values.desc: Every product starts with a reason. Design and engineering choices are guided by purpose, not decoration.

values.title: Iteration
values.desc: Progress happens in steps. We value iteration, refinement, and the patience to improve things over time.

values.title: Balance
values.desc: Form and function go together. We aim for products that feel good to use, work reliably, and age well.
